meanings.definition: A legally recognized member of a country.
meanings.sent1: Every citizen has rights and responsibilities.
meanings.sent2: The citizen voted in the election.
meanings.sent3: The citizen joked that the squirrels in the park should pay taxes too.
meanings.sent4: She was a proud citizen of the digital world, navigating through cyberspace with ease.
meanings.sent5: As a citizen of the internet, he knew all the online shortcuts and tricks.

meanings.definition: A person who is a member of a particular group or community.
meanings.sent1: The book club citizen always had a new novel to recommend.
meanings.sent2: She was a valued citizen of the local gardening society.
meanings.sent3: The citizen of the knitting circle was known for her colorful scarves.
meanings.sent4: He was a citizen of the soccer team, scoring goals with precision.
meanings.sent5: As a citizen of the drama club, she loved being on stage and performing.
